item.title: Please help. Some unfindable errors?
item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

I recently added a new “counter”, kind of like pk points. Here is what I have added, in different areas of course.

All are in client.java

[code]if (useItemID == 1964 &&

atObjectID == 4767)
{
sendMessage("You sacrafice the

banana. The fumes smell great.");
sendMessage("You now have

sacraficed “+bananaz+” bananas.");
bananaz += 1;
}
AND

public int bananaz = 0;

AND

else if
(token.equals(“character-bananaz”)) {
bananaz =

Integer.parseInt(token2);
}

AND

characterfile.write("character-bananaz points =

", 0, 27);

characterfile.write(Integer.toString(bananaz), 0,

Integer.toString(bananaz).length());
characterfile.newLine();
[/code]

.\Java\client.java:28144: ‘(’ expected
if
.\Java\client.java:28145: illegal start of expression
break;

And I get this error. I can’t find where this is since my GOTO won’t work. I don’t know why.

Read full topic
